description: They have been rumoured to be dating for almost a year. But Michael Fassbender and Alicia Vikander have not presented themselves as a couple. That all changed on Sunday night.
title: Michael Fassbender and Alicia Vikander leave Golden Globes party together
title_page: Michael Fassbender and Alicia Vikander leave Golden Globes party together | Daily Mail Online
text:
They have been rumoured to be dating for almost a year.
But Michael Fassbender and Alicia Vikander have not presented themselves as a couple to the world, making them Hollywood's most shy twosome.
That all changed at the Golden Globe Awards on Sunday night when the duo not only sat next to each other at the ceremony held at Beverly Hills' Hilton, but then later hands after exiting an after party at West Hollywood's Sunset Tower Hotel.
Scroll down for video
Hand in hand: Alicia Vikander and Michael Fassbender showed some PDA at a Golden Globes after party at the Sunset Tower on Sunday
Alicia stunned in a white column dress with her hair up and a purse on her shoulder as Michael looked dapper in a black tux.
They appeared to be waiting for a car to pick them up as she held onto her phone.
At the awards show, the two hesitated to show any affection.
See more of the latest news and red carpet pictures from the 2016 Golden Globes
Close: At the awards show, the two hesitated to show any affection
I've got to hand it to you: When he was named as a nominee for Jobs, she rubbed his arm and put a hand on his shoulder
Come on, just kiss him! And when his Jobs co-star Kate Winslet talked onstage about how impressive he is as an actor during her acceptance speech, Vikander rubbed his arm again
When he was named as a nominee for Jobs, she rubbed his arm and put a hand on his shoulder.
And when his Jobs co-star Kate Winslet talked onstage about how impressive he is as an actor during her acceptance speech, Vikander rubbed his arm again.
The chemistry was palpable, making it fairly evident they are an item.
The next big thing? Alicia stunned in a white column dress with her hair up at the NBC Universal GG party
The two have been seen out in public together for months, but have not shown any affection.
At the Infiniti Red Bull Racing Energy Station at Monte Carlo on May, they posed side by side, but did not do more than that.
It is not known why they are so shy in public, but Michael has often not talked about his love life in general.
